page.title: 12Religion
page.content: As a Christian priest I want to reflect the love of God that I know in my life. My priestly duty involves administering Holy Communion, baptizing adults who turn to Christ and children of Christian families, preparing people for Confirmation, marrying couples according to the rites of the Church of England, conducting funeral services, praying the daily offices and joining in Christian worship. I visit the sick and bereaved.I work with parishioners in the concept of"the parish caring for the parish",and we maintain the Church buildings, furnishings and churchyards.I work with neighbouring parishes particularly those in the Dunstable Deanery and co-operate with Christians of other denominations in ecumenical affairs. I am a governor of 3 local schools. Rev J Shepherd
